com.jereibaselibrary.db.litepal

类 LitePalDB

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jereibaselibrary.db.litepal.LitePalDB

  • public class LitePalDB
extends java.lang.Object
    Configuration of LitePal database. It's similar to litepal.xml configuration, but allows to configure database details at runtime. This is very important when comes to support multiple databases functionality.
    从以下版本开始:
    1.4

    • 构造器概要

      构造器和说明

      Construct a LitePalDB instance.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • LitePalDB

        public LitePalDB(java.lang.String dbName,
                 int version)
        Construct a LitePalDB instance. Database name and version are necessary fields.
        参数:
        dbName - Name of database.
        version - Version of database.

    • 方法详细资料

      • fromDefault

        public static LitePalDB fromDefault(java.lang.String dbName)
        Construct a LitePalDB instance from the default configuration by litepal.xml. But database name must be different than the default.
        参数:
        dbName - Name of database.
        返回:
        A LitePalDB instance which used the default configuration in litepal.xml but with a specified database name.

      • getVersion

        public int getVersion()

      • getDbName

        public java.lang.String getDbName()

        public boolean isExternalStorage()

      • setExternalStorage

        public void setExternalStorage(boolean isExternalStorage)

      • getClassNames

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getClassNames()
        Get the class name list. Always add table_schema as a value.
        返回:
        The class name list.

      • addClassName

        public void addClassName(java.lang.String className)
        Add a class name into the current mapping model list.
        参数:
        className - Full package class name.
